job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongstrongAbout the PositionbrbrstrongWe are looking for Software Engineers to join our rapidly growing technology team The prerequisites for joining our development team are simple We care more about your attitude and aptitude than the specific tools and technologies you have used in the past You need to have a strong passion for software development and must take pride in your coding You should also have great analytical skills and ability to handle complex modular software development in a collaborative teambased environmentbrbrstronguWhat To ExpectbrustrongulliWork on Internet scale applications where performance reliability and scalability are critical design goalsliliCreate beautiful interactive and easytouse web applications using rich clientside code and MVC based serverside codeliliCreate innovative mobile applications on a wide range of platforms including iOS Android and othersliliContribute to our core ServiceOriented Architecture SOA and EventDriven Architecture EDA in reallife applicationsliliGain experience with different database technologies ranging from traditional relational to the latest NoSQL productsliliWork in a collaborative teambased environment in an iterative Agile or Kanban brliulstronguAbout YoubrustrongulliThe ideal candidate will have a minimum of three months of educational or professional programming experience in one or more of the following C Java C ASPNET MVC PHP Ruby on Rails JavaScript JQuery Web Services and API development using REST or SOAPliliKnowledge of any of the following database technologies is desired but not required SQL Server MySQL PostgreSQL Oracle MongoDB Redis or other NoSQL technologiesliliAbility and willingness to work alongside Senior Engineers Architects and Managers to further your professional developmentliliMost importantly a successful candidate will be passionate about technology Keeping up with the latest advancements in the industry spending time creating building and exploring with technical projects an inquisitive attitude in regards to the workings of hardware and software and overall simply having fun and finding enjoyment in the fieldliliHas a graduation date of December 2020 or May 2021brliulemAt Cvent we celebrate support and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive environment Were proud to be an equal opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion gender gender identity or expression sexual orientation national origin genetics disability age veteran status or any other legally protected characteristicsem
